body.p: Born in Steubenville, Ohio. Admitted to the bar in Ohio in 1836. Practiced law in Pittsburgh from 1847 to 1855. Practiced law in Washington, D.C. from 1855 to 1860. Appointed Attorney General by President James Buchanan in December 1860. Appointed Secretary of War by President Abraham Lincoln on January 13, 1862 and served as such under Lincoln and Andrew Johnson until May 26, 1868.
